ValidationRule.description: If OtherSource_c is true, the user must fill in heard_other_c to explain how they heard about APAL. This validation fires only if the current time is greater than or equal to Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Incomplete_Submission__c), OR(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), isBlank(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c) ), OtherSource__c = true, ISBLANK(heard_other__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you heard about APAL from a different source, please specify where you heard about APAL in the ‘How did you hear about APAL? – Other’ text box.
